actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to repeal the Congressional report and waiting period requirements, contained in 38 U.S.C. section 210(b)(2), which apply to certain internal VA administrative reorganizations.

summary.text: Repeals the congressional report and waiting period requirements which apply to certain internal Veterans Administration administrative reorganizations.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the Congressional report and waiting period requirements, contained in 38 U.S.C. section 210(b)(2), which apply to certain internal VA administrative reorganizations.
